TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmPropertyAttribute

summary.span: 一个属性 (Attribute)，指示属性 (property) 表示导航属性 (property)。

span.span: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a navigation property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将类的导航属性链接到概念性模型中定义的实体类型的导航属性。The links the navigation property of a class to the navigation property of an entity type that is defined in the conceptual model. 此属性 (Attribute) 适用于下列类型的导航属性 (Property)：This attribute is applied to the following types of navigation properties: - 返回 相关对象的的属性。Properties that return an of related objects. - 返回相关对象的值的属性 ，如以下来自类型的示例中所示 `SalesOrderDetail` 。Properties that return the value of the of a related object, as in the following example from the `SalesOrderDetail` type.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系名称不应包含命名空间。The relationship name should not contain a namespace. 如果向关系名称添加命名空间，例如 "*MyNamespace*"。*MyRelationship*'，将发生错误。If you add the namespace to the relationship name, for example '*MyNamespace*.*MyRelationship*', an error will occur.

summary.span: 获取非限定的关系名称。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系名称不由命名空间限定。The relationship name is not namespace qualified. 关系的名称由在 `Name` `Association` 概念模型中定义此关系的元素的属性指定。The name of the relationship is specified by the `Name` attribute of the `Association` element that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](/ef/ef6/modeling/designer/advanced/edmx/csdl-spec#association-element-csdl)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](/ef/ef6/modeling/designer/advanced/edmx/csdl-spec#association-element-csdl).

summary.span: 导航属性的命名空间名称。

span.span: The namespace name of the navigation property.
A that is the namespace name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系的命名空间由元素的属性指定 `Namespace` `Schema` ，该元素包含用于在概念模型中定义此关系的关联。The namespace of the relationship is specified by the `Namespace` attribute of the `Schema` element that contains the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](/ef/ef6/modeling/designer/advanced/edmx/csdl-spec#association-element-csdl)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](/ef/ef6/modeling/designer/advanced/edmx/csdl-spec#association-element-csdl).
